name: cypress_project
description: This is the result of building E2E testing for the Assert QA Job Task. The project utilizes the following technologies: Cypress, Allure Report, Lighthouse, and Faker, alongside the JavaScript programming language, with GitHub Actions for CI/CD.

scripts.allure:clear: rm -r allure-results/ allure-report cypress/screenshots cypress/videos || true

author: Bojan Pavlovic <bojanpavlovicoffice@gmail.com>
